content.content: Hello Uniswap Community! I’d like to propose a change that enables lower trading fees for UNI holders. Tier 1: Holders of 1k-5k UNI pay a 25bps fee on trades on Uniswap. Tier 2: Holders of 5k-25k UNI pay a 20bps fee. Tier 3: Holders of 25k+ UNI pay a 15bps fee. Of course there can be more tiers (if we wanted to be fancy… we could even design a curve [Amt_UNI vs Fee_Bps]). Lmk if any folks are interested in discussing this. I believe it makes sense for those who hold the core asset of the protocol (UNI) to have discounted trading fees… this make UNI holders feel a little more at home when trading on the Uniswap Protocol. Thanks, Cliff.eth
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes a change in the fee structure for UNI holders on Uniswap, suggesting different tiers based on the amount of UNI held. The proposal is explained in detail, and the author invites discussion and feedback. A 3rd party may provide constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal, and the author is open to collaboration.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
